column4: So i should wait for Dapper to come out before trying to install firefox 1.5?
I have searched for that and been very unsuccessfull, I would suggest creating a custom command.  Ubotu will send you a link
Sorry, it's not quite what i was looking for.
hrmm I must have misunderstood.  Didn't you want a shortcut you could start your media player with?
I already have a shortcut to start my media player. That came with Ubuntu. I just want to change what it starts.

yes, I wanted to do this once.  I couldn't find out how.  I finally resolved that I would instead create a new shortcut that opens the media player of my choice.  Basically the same thing just not as 'clean'
Yeah, only thing is, I know i changed it from XMMS to rhythmbox, it can't be that hard.
Maybe i'll grep my log files.
really?  I thought default was rythmbox
Oh, might be when i played with another hotkeys app then
Well, Maybe i can live with rhythmbox, even though it doesn't let me change file tags./
or you can create a new shortcut :), or if you really want a hack, change the binary :)
hehe. is it just me or does rhythmbox also not sync to ipods?
